properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 2:58AM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level
expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal
waterways.

* WHERE...The lower Cape Fear River including downtown
Wilmington.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Water is six to 12 inches deep on the lowest parts of
Battleship Road and USS North Carolina Road. Water begins to
spread on to River Road about a quarter mile south of The Cape
Boulevard. In downtown Wilmington, water covers more than a
block of Water Street near Market Street with three to six
inches of water just south of Market Street.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
